nodes.text: Garth Ezzar's master was a female Dark Jedi who trained Garth Ezzar.

She first met Ezzar on a colony world in the Rim Worlds, where he had been living as an outcast. She saw his potential in the Dark side of the Force and began to train him in its use. Together, they went on a rampage, using their powers to help them commit crimes. However, when the Jedi began to investigate, she turned on Ezzar, hoping to kill him and leave him to take the blame for their crimes. However, he was enraged by this and killed her, leaving her body so that she instead could take the blame.
